_description: A Christmas carol — five quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Welcum yole for euer & ay’ and burden: ‘Welcum yole in glod aray / In worchip of the holeday’

BodDou302.First Lines:
Welcum be þou heuen kyngWelcum I bore in hon
                    mornyng…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…ffore ȝolis loue now makis mereWelcum ȝole for euer
                    & ay

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Wolcum be þou heuene kyngWolcum born in on
                    morwenyng…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Wolcum alle & make good chereWolcum alle another
                    yereWolcum yol
